name: Pirate Signal
description:
In the year 2087, humanity has spread across the stars, but not everyone is free. The galaxy is ruled by a tyrannical empire, which controls every aspect of life with an iron fist. You are a member of the resistance, a ragtag group of rebels fighting against the oppression of the empire.

One day, you discover that the empire has developed a secret defense system that they use to ward their vessels from attacks. The Imperial Defense Signal has the power to manipulate the ship's systems and create impenetrable defenses.

However, you have received intel that the Defense Signal can be hacked, and used to gain access to the empire's most valuable supplies. With this information, you set out on a dangerous mission to infiltrate an imperial freighter and use the Pirate Signal to unlock its secrets.

You must use your cunning and technical expertise to bypass the empire's security measures, cut a hole in the side of the ship, and make off with the supplies. The fate of the resistance rests in your hands. Can you outwit the empire and use their own technology against them?
